summary: AS I WAS DRIVING ON I-95 HEADING NORTH FROM FLORIDA TO VIRGINIA.  MY BF GOODRICH LONG TRAIL TA EXPERIENCED TREAD SEPARATION.  THERE WERE NO INJURIES AS I WAS ABLE TO CONTROL AND STOP THE CAR, BUT THERE WAS DAMAGE TO THE UNDERSIDE OF MY CAR.   *NLM
